utter_faq/installation_python.text:
Download any stable version- https://www.python.org/downloads/windows/ 
Make sure to select the box 'add python to PATH' 
Go to windows search bar and Type 'Python'. If Python-version-bits shows up, you have successfully installed Python in your machine.

utter_faq/installation_anaconda.text:
Download the anaconda software from following- https://www.anaconda.com/products/distribution 
click next, accept the License Agreement 
text: Select the user for whom you want to isntall the anaconda (just me or All users) 
text: Select the destination folder 
text: Add anaconda to the PATH variable and click Install. 
text: After installation - if required, you may also install PyCharm from the link provided. 
text: Go to windows search bar and Type 'Jupyter notebook'. If Jupyter Notebook (anaconda3) shows up, you have successfully installed Anaconda with Jupyter notebook
